features: 【BUILD YOUR OWN FOREST MAGNET WORLD】 Get ready to experience the fun of magnetic toys with this new magnetic cubes kit! Build a forest castle to add your existing dinosaur toys, and start your forest adventure with role-play fun and pretend toys. Magnetic blocks open up a dream world of possibility, from simple to challenging construction. Let kids’ imaginations run wild with our magnetic open-ended playset.

【PERFECT SENSORY MONTESSORI TOYS FOR KIDS】Combining the science of UV technology and magnetism which make your building arts more vivid and realistic than those of simple pure colored cubes, 100pcs magnet world set offers a wealth of patterns. More cubes, more possibilities to unleash kid's creativity. Kids will get everything to decorate their little castle or red brick city for their dolls. And they can even build a forest parking lot to park their toy cars.

【TODDLER & BEGINNER TOYS MINE WORLD MAGNETIC SET】Unlike other magnet toys on the market, our magnetic cubes kit with super strong internal magnets, which is easier for toddlers ages 3+ to stick the cubes together and make builds sturdy. And round edges and the right size won't hurt little hands. Perfect STEM toys help kids gain a deeper understanding of the structure world and learn about magnetic properties. Recommended toys gifts for toddlers and kids ages 3-8.

【LEARNING WITH CREATIVE FUN】 Construction and building blocks toys unlock many skills for kids. With this magnetic tiles to build, spin, destroy, and rebuild, it helps to promote kids’ creative thinking, focus & patience, cooperative ability, spatial and motor skills. Come with an idea booklet to guide and inspire them to explore the magnetic dream world. It is a fun solo activity or with friends and offers an important alternative to screen time.

【EXCELLENT STEM GIFT-GIVING IDEA】The joy of Toylogy magnetic tiles is that it keeps kids of all ages busy for years to come. It's a great fidget kids toys for classroom,toddlers, preschoolers, teenagers, 3 4 5 6+ years old boys and girls. Perfect educational gifts for birthdays, Christmas, Children's day, STEM, and school activities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel, good quality, printed images
reviews.reviewText: I love these blocks so much that I ordered a second set of them with different colors/variations than the first set. They are the perfect size for building and aren’t too big or bulky. I would definitely not recommend these for any children that still stick things in their mouth, though, just because they’re small enough that they could potentially get stuck in their mouth.The images are printed on the blocks (not a sticker) which adds a much nicer quality to the item. They work well with other brands of magnetic block sets I’ve gotten in the past. There are no visible seams on the blocks, which eases any concerns I had over the blocks breaking open and spilling magnetic beads.They fit really well in a small 5x7 photo box that I keep in my child’s going out bag. They are a wonderful toy to keep kids occupied in the car or out at dinner instead of just sticking a tablet in front of them. They are great for imaginative play. I’ve seen some reviews where the other brands of magnetic blocks don’t come with enough to build the cool items featured on the boxes; however, this set came with a decent amount of blocks and I thought it was more than enough variations in colors/designs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 6-year-old son has been playing with these nonstop since he received them for Christmas! He likes watching Minecraft videos on YouTube but isn’t old enough to play the computer game, so this is a way for him to experience the creative aspect of Minecraft and I like that it’s tactile rather than virtual so probably better for his developing brain anyway. We did get him 2 sets of the 100-piece which I would say is the minimum you would want to be able to actually build anything significant. We later bought another set of 100 and also a 72-piece mining set. The pieces are high quality plastic, at first I was surprised at how tiny they are but actually if they were much bigger they would need larger magnets inside and it would get to be a heavy/large/cumbersome toy. They are just the right size and take up minimal space to store. My 4 year old also enjoys playing with them but they don’t keep his attention as long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pricey, but so fun to play with!
reviews.reviewText: I expected these to be sort of flimsy based on videos I've seen of influencers playing with similar blocks. But these are solid, sturdy, and good quality. They are a little pricey for what you get, but I like to play with them almost as much as my daughter does. They are really fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A WIN WITH THE KIDS
reviews.reviewText: These are a lot smaller than the look in the picture. They are sturdy and the kids love them but they are small and 100 pieces do not go a long way to even build what you are wanting to build. It would take several boxes to create something other than a small tree or small house. The price is nuts for this product but again the kids ages 2 and 6 are always playing with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are such a cute idea. My older kids are obsessed with minecraft and my two year old wants to play so bad with the. These look like the minecraft cubes they play with on the tv which allows my two year old to think he is playing minecraft too!!!! They have balls inside them that jingle when you handle them and the magnets are very strong which allows hours of designing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicely made, love the rattle! Happy!
reviews.reviewText: I bought two sets of these. One set first that did not say, and even seemed to go out of their way not to say how many were in the set [48 as it happens]. A small box, though I think they call it introductory somewhere. No, that is not enough though and I found that deceptive. But when I got them, I loved them so I bought this bigger set that had 100 pieces. So now I have enough for my grandkids to share. If I get a windfall, I might buy the Frozen set too, but I'm good for now.I buy Brio and Thomas train and legos too, so I know some things just cost a lot. These also will last a long time, like legos and our trains, you can pass them down from kid to kid. I can keep them on a shelf for my grandkids and any other kid that comes around, and to play with now and again myself. I love the rattle sound and the feel of the clack as each pulls together. I think they stick together decently well and I was able to build a tree with pieces at an angle as well as the basic side to side. I think these would be great for kids or adults that like sensory amusements. Nice to run your finger across, kinda has a fuzzy slightly lifted feel. It is a plastic texture but feels good, and is well built.To save you trouble, I read lots of reviews and these and the one's with TNT pattern are not the same size. I did have a hard time deciding because I loved the flower pattern on the others but went with bigger. I have a young grandson and thought bigger would be better. They are still pretty small though, so do keep that in mind if you have very little ones. Almost but not quite one inch per side.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super fun, creative, and vibrant building blocks!
reviews.reviewText: Product arrived exactly as pictured, and we are very pleased with the quality, ease of use/packaging, vibrant colors, and sturdiness. The fact that they aren't heavy makes them so much easier to build with than other products, and really expand the creative horizons of the user! We love these blocks, and highly recommend them. Thanks for a great product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for kids who love minecraft~
reviews.reviewText: This little 1 inch square blocks are great for kids! They are sturdy and have great magnetic properties.
